onCooldown: ### You are on cooldown for %d second(s)!
error: ### An error occurred, try again later.
loremasterWaiting:
### The Kuudra Loremaster will appear on the Blazing Fortress <t:%d:R>.
*Note that the Kuudra Loremaster will only appear if one of the following lines have been used in front of him on Crimson Isle:*
- `THE BRIDGE IS COLLAPSING, GET TO THE CENTER!`
- `Those orbs strengthen Kuudra! Shoot them down with your cannons!`
- `A Dropship! Take it down before it's too late!`
loremasterActive:

*Note that the Kuudra Loremaster will only appear if one of the following lines have been used in front of him on Crimson Isle:*
- `THE BRIDGE IS COLLAPSING, GET TO THE CENTER!`
- `Those orbs strengthen Kuudra! Shoot them down with your cannons!`
- `A Dropship! Take it down before it's too late!`

## <@%s> is warping players into their lobby!
Put your IGN in this thread and they'll try to party you ASAP.
Do not ping <@%s> unless they ask for you to.
